docs.lead_paragraph: Republican White House candidate Mike Huckabee earned more than $975,000 in the last 16 months in speaking fees, in front of audiences including chambers of commerce, schools and universities, ministries and pregnancy outreach organizations.

headline.main: Mark Zuckerberg Posts on Facebook: After Miscarriages, We’re Having a Baby
headline.print_headline: Zuckerberg and Wife Say They’re Expecting a Child

docs.abstract: The chief executive of Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, disclosed that he and his wife, Priscilla Chan, are expecting a baby girl. The road to get there wasn’t easy.
docs.snippet: The chief executive of Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, disclosed that he and his wife, Priscilla Chan, are expecting a baby girl. The road to get there wasn’t easy.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge said he would dismiss a lawsuit filed by a pregnant prisoner who sought an abortion after the woman told him during a hearing Friday she had changed her mind and now wants to deliver the child, a reversal called "highly suspicious" by one of her lawyers.

headline.main: Lawsuit From Prisoner Who Sought an Abortion Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit From Prisoner Who Sought an Abortion Dismissed

docs.lead_paragraph: The vow by some Republicans to reject a spending bill that includes funds for Planned Parenthood is their latest attempt to affect policy by threatening to shut the government.

headline.main: Taking Aim at Planned Parenthood, Conservatives Use Familiar Tactic
headline.print_headline: Taking Aim at Planned Parenthood, Conservatives Use a Familiar Tactic

docs.abstract: Conservative Republicans are threatening to shut down government amid pledge to reject any spending bill that does not cut off funds for Planned Parenthood; point to videos alleging group sells fetal tissue for medical research; is latest example of ardent conservatives threatening shut down unless their policies are advanced.
docs.snippet: The vow by some Republicans to reject a spending bill that includes funds for Planned Parenthood is their latest attempt to affect policy by threatening to shut the government.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tiona Rodriguez, 18, is accused of suffocating the boy, who was discovered while she stole from a Victoria’s Secret store in 2013, the Manhattan district attorney’s office said.

headline.main: Murder Charge for Brooklyn Woman Whose Infant Was Found Dead in a Bag
headline.print_headline: Murder Charge in Death of Baby Found in a Bag

docs.abstract: Brooklyn woman Tiona Rodriguez is charged with murder of her newborn son in 2013; pleads not guilty, claiming baby was stillborn; body was discovered in tote bag day after birth when Rodriguez was arrested for shoplifting at Manhattan store.
docs.snippet: Tiona Rodriguez, 18, is accused of suffocating the boy, who was discovered while she stole from a Victoria’s Secret store in 2013, the Manhattan district attorney’s office said.

byline.contributor: Benjamin Mueller and Vivian Yee contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: A teenage girl suffocated her just-born baby boy before putting his body in a shopping bag, then going on a trip to a Victoria's Secret store the next day, prosecutors said as she was charged with murder Thursday.

headline.main: Teen Accused of Suffocating Newborn Son, Then Going Shopping
headline.print_headline: Teen Accused of Suffocating Newborn Son, Then Going Shopping

docs.snippet: A teenage girl suffocated her just-born baby boy before putting his body in a shopping bag, then going on a trip to a Victoria's Secret store the next day, prosecutors said as she was charged with murder Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Canadian authorities have approved the abortion pill known as RU-486 for use across the country.

docs.lead_paragraph: Despite my uneasiness with it, the science has saved countless lives.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by microbiologist Nathalia Holt examines fetal-cell research in light of controversy surrounding videotaped remarks by Dr Deborah Nucatola of Planned Parenthood; argues that while use of discarded fetal tissue for research is emotionally unsettling, it has also provided invaluable insights that have saved countless lives.
docs.snippet: Despite my uneasiness with it, the science has saved countless lives.
